Name: Beat Back
Description: Deal 2 damage. If you have three or more cards in hand, also deal 2 damage to another enemy.

Name: Submerge
Description:
Recover 3 vitality.
Blank a card until tomorrow.

Name: Overpower
Description: Deal 6 damage. If more damage is dealt to an enemy this way than is necessary to discard it, deal that excess damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.
